mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At Ambassy, our mission is to revolutionize the way brands and creators collaborate. We believe in the power of authentic storytelling to drive meaningful connections and measurable results.

innovation.title: Industry Innovation
innovation.description: We're planning to tokenize the creator economy, empowering influencers to monetize their digital presence.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: We're revolutionizing digital marketing by connecting brands and creators worldwide. For E-commerce Pros, we've empowered thousands of businesses to skyrocket their online presence and sales, delivering exceptional ROI. For Ambassadors, we've launched careers and helped passionate individuals build thriving personal brands, reaching millions of engaged followers. Together, we're shaping the future of digital marketing, transforming the way brands and creators collaborate to achieve unprecedented growth and engagement.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before joining Ambassy

0.question: Do I need a minimum number of followers?
0.answer: We value engagement quality. Micro-influencers with engaged communities are welcome.

1.question: How am I paid?
1.answer: Payments are securely processed through our platform. Options include bank transfer, PayPal, and crypto. Typically within 7–14 days after a campaign.

2.question: Can I join if I'm not based in the U.S.?
2.answer: Absolutely! Ambassy is a global platform present in over 40 countries.

3.question: What kind of support do you offer?
3.answer: Personalized onboarding, account manager, strategic advice, negotiation help, and 24/7 technical support.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before upgrading to the Pro Plan

0.question: What is included in the Pro Plan?
0.answer: The Pro Plan includes advanced analytics, priority support, custom branding, exclusive resources, unlimited collaborations, and early access to new features.

1.question: How much does the Pro Plan cost?
1.answer: The Pro Plan is available for a monthly subscription of $39.99 or an annual subscription of $422.

2.question: Can I cancel my Pro Plan subscription?
2.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Pro Plan subscription at any time. There are no long-term commitments.

3.question: What payment methods are accepted?
3.answer: We accept payments via credit card, PayPal. Your payment information is securely processed.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the VIP Plan.

1.question: What makes the VIP Plan different?
1.answer: The VIP Plan includes all features from the Ambassador and Pro plans, along with exclusive tools like TikTok Ads, Google Ads, and a dedicated account manager.

2.question: Is there a long-term commitment?
2.answer: No, the VIP Plan is a monthly subscription. You can cancel anytime.

3.question: How do I track my results?
3.answer: You’ll have access to custom reports and advanced real-time analytics: reach, engagement, ROI, and more.

4.question: What types of brands can benefit?
4.answer: E-commerce, fitness, tech, fashion, and many others. Any brand looking to grow quickly can benefit.

cta.title: Ready to Dominate Your Market?
cta.subtitle: Unlock the full power of the VIP Plan and take your brand to the next level.
cta.noObligations: No obligations. No hidden fees. Start your VIP journey today.
